component.name: ignite-queue
component.title: Ignite Queues
component.description: Interact with Ignite Queue data structures.
component.label: messaging,queue

CamelIgniteQueueOperation.label: producer
CamelIgniteQueueOperation.description: Allows you to dynamically change the queue operation.

CamelIgniteQueueMaxElements.label: producer
CamelIgniteQueueMaxElements.description: When invoking the DRAIN operation, the amount of items to drain.

CamelIgniteQueueTransferredCount.label: producer
CamelIgniteQueueTransferredCount.description: The amount of items transferred as the result of the DRAIN operation.

CamelIgniteQueueTimeoutMillis.label: producer
CamelIgniteQueueTimeoutMillis.description: Dynamically sets the timeout in milliseconds to use when invoking the OFFER or POLL operations.

configuration.label: producer
configuration.description: The collection configuration. Default: empty configuration. You can also conveniently set inner properties by using configuration.xyz=123 options.

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

operation.label: producer
operation.description: The operation to invoke on the Ignite Queue. Superseded by the IgniteConstants.IGNITE_QUEUE_OPERATION header in the IN message. Possible values: CONTAINS, ADD, SIZE, REMOVE, ITERATOR, CLEAR, RETAIN_ALL, ARRAY, DRAIN, ELEMENT, PEEK, OFFER, POLL, TAKE, PUT.

propagateIncomingBodyIfNoReturnValue.displayName: Propagate Incoming Body If No Return Value
propagateIncomingBodyIfNoReturnValue.description: Sets whether to propagate the incoming body if the return type of the underlying Ignite operation is void.

timeoutMillis.label: producer
timeoutMillis.description: The queue timeout in milliseconds. Default: no timeout.

treatCollectionsAsCacheObjects.description: Sets whether to treat Collections as cache objects or as Collections of items to insert/update/compute, etc.
